title: Jhin E particle bug?
body:
I was playing Jhin on URF and i noticed that when enemies stepped on my Lotus traps the particles were high noon Jhin's particles and the mark it put on enemies was as if i were using high noon jhin.
But i was playing without a skin and it would only proc on champions with the wrong particles


There was a high noon jhin on the enemy team though i think that had something to do with it

replies.body:
Hey venombot -

Thanks for the report! It does have to do with having a High Noon Jhin on the enemy team. This appears to be a case of particle theft. D: This can happen with other skins - when there is a base w. someone with a skin. Lemme see what we can do!
